summary: PostgreSQL and MoonYetis System Diagnostic Checks

message.content:
Verificar PostgreSQL
systemctl status postgresql
Verificar servicios corriendo
pm2 status
Verificar conexión a base de datos
psql -h localhost -U postgres -d moonyetis_production -c "\dt"
Verificar APIs de Fractal Bitcoin
curl -X POST https://fractal-api.unisat.io/query -H "Content-Type: application/json"

content.text: I'll help you verify these system components. Let me run these checks in parallel:

input.description: Test database connection and list tables

content.text:
✅ **PostgreSQL**: Active and running  
✅ **PM2**: moonyetis-production online (82.4MB, 3 restarts)  
❌ **Database**: Needs password authentication  
❌ **Fractal API**: Returns 404 (endpoint may be incorrect)

For database access, you'll need to provide the postgres password or use peer authentication.

message.content:
Usar autenticación peer (más simple)
sudo -u postgres psql -d moonyetis_production -c "\dt"
2. API de Fractal Bitcoin
# Verificar endpoint correcto en tu .env.production
cat .env.production | grep FRACTAL_BITCOIN_RPC_URL
# Probar endpoints alternativos:
curl -X POST https://fractal-node.unisat.io/
curl -X POST https://rpc.fractalbitcoin.io/

input.description: Connect to PostgreSQL using peer authentication
Check Fractal Bitcoin RPC URL in production config
Test alternative Fractal Bitcoin RPC endpoint

content.text:
✅ **Database**: Connected to `moonyetis_slots` with 3 tables  
✅ **Config**: Found `.env.production` with `FRACTAL_API_URL=https://fractal-api.unisat.io`

Testing the configured Fractal API endpoint:

input.description: Test Fractal API with RPC method

content.text:
**Status Summary:**
- ✅ PostgreSQL: Running
- ✅ PM2: moonyetis-production online
- ✅ Database: `moonyetis_slots` accessible (3 tables)
- ❌ Fractal API: Endpoint returns 404

The Fractal Bitcoin API URL in your config may be incorrect or outdated.

message.content:
Ver la URL actual configurada
grep -i "FRACTAL.*URL" .env.production
# Probar estas URLs alternativas:
curl -s "https://mempool.fractalbitcoin.io/api/blocks/tip/height"
curl -s "https://open-api.unisat.io/v1/indexer/address/bc1p.../brc20/summary"
curl -s "https://api.fractalbitcoin.io/v1/blocks/tip"
Una vez identifiques la URL que funciona, actualiza tu .env.production:
# Editar configuración
nano .env.production
# Cambiar FRACTAL_BITCOIN_RPC_URL por la URL correcta
# Reiniciar servicio
pm2 restart moonyetis-production

content.text:
✅ **Current config**: `FRACTAL_API_URL=https://fractal-api.unisat.io`  
✅ **Working API**: `https://mempool.fractalbitcoin.io` (returns height: 846727)  
❌ **Other APIs**: Not accessible or invalid

Updating configuration with working API:
